messages.message: Late to the party here! But I generally prefer obfuscation from business perspective.
By calling Abbyy as Ari we avoid a lot of questions around why are we using Abbyy instead of say our own OCR model.
I'm cool with a 1 to 1 mapping since it's become clear that OCR is not our key differentiator currently, but rather our ability to integrate and combine many features together
back when we had fewer features and less market validation, I think needing to sell that we had better OCR was more important, but I think it's less important now
Curious engineers will always figure out what is going on behind the scenes. Call a spade a spade.
